briefTitle: Urea Breath Test (UBT) With Breath Hp System /BreathID Hp Lab System Pediatrics
officialTitle: Clinical Confirmation Study to Confirm Safety and Presence of H. Pylori With 13C-Urea Breath Test Using the BreathID® Hp and BreathID® Hp Lab Systems in the Pediatric Population
summary: Clinical Study to Confirm Safety and Accuracy in Detection of H. pylori with 13C-Urea Breath Test using the BreathID® Hp and BreathID® Hp Lab Systems in the Pediatric Population

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Reported Adverse Events
